clean_data: Consultant Consultant IT Systems Administrator with experience in datacenters operations disaster recovery and network security San Diego CA I am a skilled IT administrator with over 15 years of experience I have served as the gotoguy for everything technology related for a number of small to mid size businesses I have the responsibility to come up with the necessary solutions and put together the right teams in order to ensure smooth and predictable IT operations for my clients I have worked in IT for radiologymedicine accountancy software development business compliance non profit At the moment I am seeking a change in my career path and am looking for a full time position for better application and the growth of my skills Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Consultant Excelln LLC San Diego CA January 2017 to Present Managed vendors and provided planningconfiguration support for interfacing between HISRISPACS systems with other medical groups in the region These projects enabled my clients being able to send and receive patient orders and results electronically while being HIPAA compliant and resulting in a streamlined service for patients Developed cloud based deployment scenarios by integrating proprietary apps and servers into Azure AWS and Google Cloud Platform Migrated and managed Vmware ESXi and HyperV environmentsProvided project management support for interfacing medical EHR systems Explored Hyper Converged Infrastructure solutions for clients Provided SUSE Enterprise Linux and hardware configuration assistance for setting up a SAP HANA development environment Provided configuration and management support for the WAN Firewall and VPN gateways that enable the employees to operate from around the world Setup Remote Desktop Server Environments in order to enable remote users to access network applications Integrated AWS EC2 instances to existing onsite server infrastructure after the business acquired another firm Managed Centralized ESET Endpoint Antivirus Remote Administration Server Managed Windows Active Directory Group Policy Developed and maintained network documentation SOPs and training manuals for end users and business administrators Consultant Bitwise Consulting San Diego CA January 2015 to December 2016 Developed and Tested automatic failover solutions using VMware HA and VmWare VSA utilizing VSA clustering Provided disaster recovery support including support for CryptoLocker based attack on client data storage infrastructure Helped plan buildout of a datacenter production environments Provided Security Policy Assessment and helped develop and implement new security procedures Sr Systems Administrator TeraCenter Inc San Diego CA March 2004 to December 2014 Built and managed a datacenter for storing client backups using a custom Gentoo Linux build Developed security policies and standard operating procedures Did security analysis migration planning and helped with on boarding of new clients Provided product support and troubleshooting support to clients for vast variety of issues including WAN ISP routing loss of connectivity DNS MX etc Education BS in Computer Engineering University of CaliforniaIrvine Irvine CA September 1998 to September 2002 Skills Vmware ESXi 5 years Microsoft Windows Server 10 years Linux 6 years Sonicwall OS 5 years Mac OS X 5 years Network Administration 10 years Vmware VSA Less than 1 year Cisco IOS 2 years NessusTenable Vulnerability Scanner 2 years Google Apps Administration 6 years Microsoft Azure Less than 1 year Microsoft Office 365 1 year Amazon AWS Less than 1 year DNS 8 years Thomson Reuters Creative Solutions Suite 7 years HIPAA 5 years WireShark 2 years Troubleshooting ITElectronicsSoftware 10 years Docker Less than 1 year Matlab Less than 1 year Quickbooks 10 years System Administrator Vmware System Admin Active Directory Linux Administrator Links httpwwwexcellncom
